Class LogicalCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightsleep.component.LogicalCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Condition, SqlComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    And, Or

    public abstract class LogicalCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements Condition
    The abstract superclass of And and Or.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Condition> conditions()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of the conditions.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns whether this component is empty.
      Condition optimized()
      Optimizes and returns the components of this condition.
      In particular, returns Condition.EMPTY if conditions.isEmpty(), conditions.get(0) if conditions.size() == 1, this otherwise.

        public Condition optimized()
        Optimizes and returns the components of this condition.
        In particular, returns Condition.EMPTY if conditions.isEmpty(), conditions.get(0) if conditions.size() == 1, this otherwise.
